Text:
K4YM1K,  Your comment made my day.  Thanks. 

Nice to know someone appreciates the hours and hours of work that goes into capping, encoding and uploading shows.   

Changing topics.. this has been downloaded 150+ times, and there's currently only 14 seeders.  People better come back and seed if you want season 2 to be uploaded!
yes dude awesome been after this :)

Fuck ya!  Really appreciate the time you took to put this up.  I am seeding at well over 700k and will continue to until I see Season 2.

Thanks again duranie

Just epic, been looking for this everywhere, and here it is!

Keep up the nice work, gonna seed it like crazy.
When do you think season 2 will be up? :D

Thank you!

Hey guys, thanks for the comments.
I don't have a timeframe on season 2 yet. 
Hopefully in early March, but no promises.
Thanx D! You made my week!
hey man just a question, you still working on season 2?
